content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I tried various shell commands to activate the arcgis environment but received error messages stating that the file could not be found. I attempted to activate the environment using different paths, but they all failed. I also tried executing the command "conda activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'" but received an error message stating that conda was not found. Latest development shows that I tried to execute several shell commands to install and activate the arcgis environment, but they all returned error messages stating that the file could not be found or that conda was not found.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "/opt/conda/bin/conda activate arcgis && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: /opt/conda/bin/conda: not found\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
